June 19, 2011 D Kirkby Lonsdale Contest
Kirkby Lonsdale Contest 0 March, Hymn and Own Choice Test Piece Contest
kirkby-lonsdale-contest
Market Square, Kirkby Lonsdale, Cumbria, England, UK Graham O'Connor - music judge; Alan Lawton - entertainment judge; John Knewstubb - deportment judge.
Band with Highest Points: Greenalls MD of Winning Band: Karl Stott (Greenalls) Best Entertainment: Pilling Jubilee Silver Best Soloist: Gareth Beasley (Euphonium) - Hazel Grove Best Instrumentalist: Gareth Beasley (Euphonium) - Hazel Grove Best Deportment: Brindle
9 bands played.

Best Hymn: Greenalls Best March: Greenalls
Fourth section: 1 Pilling 2 Sale
Best Hymn: Pilling Silver Jubilee Best March: Sale Brass
